roleset.name: stationing troops in a military post
roleset.note: GARRISONING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from garrisoning.01-n)

example.name: garrison-v: args0, 2
example.text: The US at once had a wolf by the ear . Finally , the US had to make its attitude clear : its garrisoning in the Philippines could be done by flexible and cyclic means .
